text: If a man receives circumcision on the Sabbath, so that the Law of Moses won't be broken, are you angry at me because I made a whole manThe Lord seems to be contrasting circumcision, which involves only a small part of the body, with His healing, which involved the whole body. well on the Sabbath?Hey, the last healing on a Sabbath in Jerusalem, as recorded by John, happened a year and a half ago! In fact, none of the four Gospels records any activity by Jesus in Jerusalem during the year and a half since John 5. Jesus seems to be implying that they are still mad about that!
